lemma Expactation2or1: "finite S \<Longrightarrow> finite Tr \<Longrightarrow> finite Fa \<Longrightarrow> card Tr + card Fa + card S \<le> l \<Longrightarrow> S \<inter> (Tr \<union> Fa) = {} \<Longrightarrow> Tr \<inter> Fa = {} \<Longrightarrow> S \<union> Tr \<union> Fa \<subseteq> {0..<l} \<Longrightarrow> (\<Sum>x\<in>{xs. (\<forall>i\<in>Tr. xs ! i) \<and> (\<forall>i\<in>Fa. \<not> xs ! i) \<and> length xs = l}. \<Sum>j\<in>S. if x ! j then 2 else 1) = 3 / 2 * real (card S) * 2 ^ (l - card Tr - card Fa)"
